Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Gastrointestinal \Gas`tro*in*tes"ti*nal\, a. [Gastro- + -intestinal.] (Anat. & Med.) Of or pertaining to the stomach and intestines; gastroenteric. [1913 Webster]
gastrointestinal adj : of or relating to the stomach and intestines; "a gastrointestinal disorder" [syn: {gi}]
